journals.title: Barcelona: A City of Art and Architecture
journals.excerpt: Exploring the masterpieces of Gaudí and the vibrant streets of Barcelona. From the Sagrada Família to Park Güell, every corner tells a story of creativity and passion.

journals.title: San Francisco: Innovation and Inspiration
journals.excerpt: Five months in the Bay Area, experiencing the heart of tech innovation while discovering the natural beauty of California's coast.
journals.tags: travel, san francisco, technology, innovation, california
